alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Clinton; Howard; Tipton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 11:43AM EDT until April 05 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Carroll County in north central Indiana... Northwestern Clinton County in central Indiana... Howard County in central Indiana... Northwestern Tipton County in central Indiana... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1143 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Delphi to near Frankfort, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Burlington around 1150 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kokomo, Russiaville, Indian Heights and Greentown. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 155 and 156. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for central and north central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
